topic_metadata.title: Cetz plot - How can I hide the shared-zero in school-book axis style?

posts.name: Flavio
posts.cooked:
I’ve seen in the source code this comment. But i don’t find a way to set this parameter to false and hide the “0” in the axis.
Thanks a lot!

/// #show-parameter-block(“shared-zero”, (“bool”, “content”), default: “$0$”, [School-book style axes only: Content to display at the plots origin (0,0). If set to false, nothing is shown. Having this set, suppresses auto-generated ticks for $0$!])
posts.raw:
I've seen in the source code this comment. But i don't find a way to set this parameter to false and hide the "0" in the axis.
Thanks a lot!

> /// #show-parameter-block("shared-zero", ("bool", "content"), default: "$0$", [School-book style axes only: Content to display at the plots origin (0,0). If set to `false`, nothing is shown. Having this set, suppresses auto-generated ticks for $0$!])

posts.name: Gaweringo
posts.cooked:
Seems like set-style(axes: (shared-zero: false)) is how you set the shared-zero parameter.

Found it here:

github.com

mariunaise/HDA-Thesis/blob/80a1eca011db268ba52728eeb352c6d145fc177e/graphics/quantizers/two-bit-enroll.typ#L7


      
    
          
  1. #import "@preview/cetz:0.2.2": canvas, plot, draw, palette
    2. 
          
  2. 
          
  3. #let line_style = (stroke: (paint: black, thickness: 2pt))
    4. 
          
  4. #let dashed = (stroke: (dash: "dashed"))
    5. 
          
  5. #canvas({
    6. 
          
  6.   import draw: *
    7. 
          
  7.   set-style(axes: (shared-zero: false))
    8. 
          
  8.   plot.plot(size: (8,6),
    9. 
          
  9.     x-tick-step: 0.25,
    10. 
          
  10.     y-label: $cal(Q)(2, 1, tilde(x))$,
    11. 
          
  11.     x-label: $tilde(x)$,
    12. 
          
  12.     y-tick-step: none,
    13. 
          
  13.     y-ticks: ((0.25, [00]), (0.5, [01]), (0.75, [10]), (1, [11])),
    14. 
          
  14.     axis-style: "left",
    15. 
          
  15.     //x-min: 0,
    16. 
          
  16.     x-max: 1,
    17. 
          
  17.     y-min: 0,
    18.
posts.raw:
Seems like `set-style(axes: (shared-zero: false))` is how you set the `shared-zero` parameter.

Found it here:
https://github.com/mariunaise/HDA-Thesis/blob/80a1eca011db268ba52728eeb352c6d145fc177e/graphics/quantizers/two-bit-enroll.typ#L7
